The steps label and spin box look kinda isolated on the right:

![timesteps.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/6171110-timesteps.png)

It's tough trying to have a one-size-fits-all solution, but I think we should avoid leaving a lot of unused space inside the widget itself. So I'd be ok with any arrangement where there is no empty space, whatever you think is best (vertical, horizontal, grid... dealer's choice :wink: ).
